Bethlehem Lutheran Church â€” Weekly Schedule

Sunday Services: 9:00 AM and 11:00 AM
Wednesday Evening Bible Study: 6:30 PM
Youth Group: Fridays 7:00-9:00 PM

All are welcome. Childcare available during Sunday services.
2511 East Franklin Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55406

---

Lake Harriet Yoga in the Park

Free community yoga every Saturday morning, 8:00-9:00 AM at the Lake Harriet Bandshell.
All levels welcome. Bring your own mat. Cancelled in case of rain.
Season runs May through September.

Instructor: Sarah Chen, certified RYT-500
Questions? Email lakeharrietyoga@gmail.com

---

Powderhorn Park Farmers Market

Every Sunday, 9 AM - 1 PM through October
Fresh local produce, baked goods, crafts, and live music.
EBT/SNAP accepted at the info booth. Market Bucks program doubles your first $10.

3400 15th Avenue South, Minneapolis
